my movie-sense is tingling

Would be nice, theyd need good actors though, the ones they did were crap.

item.title: Escape from city 17 - interview with director
item.dc:creator: Door
item.description:
Someonerandm:

Think about it. If its live action, its not in game, and if its not in game, we’re not seeing what it will look like.

Oh, I didn’t mean instead of an in-game trailer, I mean alongside an in-game trailer that showed off the smexy updated Source engine. I couldn’t bear it if it was instead of an in-game trailer.

Read full topic
item.source: Escape from city 17 - interview with director

item.title: Escape from city 17 - interview with director
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
I don’t imagine them making a movie… but I do imagine them making a trailer of sorts for some of the half life games. I know ep 3 is currently being tested so surly it should be in the coming months and we can finally find out what the purchase brothers have to do with it if anything.

Read full topic
item.source: Escape from city 17 - interview with director

item.title: Escape from city 17 - interview with director
item.dc:creator: Orpheon
item.description:
xVortigauntx:

I think I’d actually be disappointed if they decided to make a Half-Life movie and started it from the escape instead of from Black Mesa itself… Or at least the invasion. And the way the guys get shot in the first ep was really Hollywood. Dramatic slow fall and stuff. That really bothers me :S

Well theres no way to know really, as Escape from City 17 was more of a one-off project. If they made a movie it could happen anytime within the Half-Life timeline, though it probably wouldn’t follow Gordon for long, or at all.

What would be really interesting is if they made a movie in between the games. We know a little about what happened then but to actually see some of the effects of the portal storms and the Seven Hour War would be awesome.

Read full topic
item.source: Escape from city 17 - interview with director

item.title: Escape from city 17 - interview with director
item.dc:creator: Orpheon
item.description:
Someonerandm:

DO NOT WANT!

Think about it. If its live action, its not in game, and if its not in game, we’re not seeing what it will look like.

I’d prefer something else from them.

I agree. I’d rather see an in-game tech demo as a trailer for Episode 3, and a full-length movie from the Purchase Brothers.

Read full topic

DO NOT WANT!

I’d prefer something else from them.
